mapper.insert: insert into mail(MAIL_NO, MAIL_CONT, MAIL_SENDDATE, MAIL_SENDSTAT, MAIL_RECESTAT, MAIL_RECEIVER, MAIL_SENDER, MAIL_TITLE) values (MAIL_SEQ.nextval, #{mailCont}, #{mailSenddate}, #{mailSendstat}, #{mailRecestat}, #{mailReceiver}, #{mailSender}, #{mailTitle})
mapper.select: select * from employee a, mail b where a.emp_no = b.mail_sender and b.mail_receiver = #{empEmail} order by b.mail_SendDate desc
select * from employee a, mail b where a.emp_email = b.mail_receiver and b.mail_sender = #{empNo} order by mail_SendDate desc

select a.*, b.emp_name as MAIL_SENDER_NAME, b.emp_email as MAIL_SENDER_EMAIL, b.emp_posit as MAIL_SENDER_POSIT, c.emp_name as MAIL_RECEIVER_NAME, c.emp_posit as MAIL_RECEIVER_POSIT from mail a left join employee b on a.mail_sender = b.emp_no left join employee c on a.mail_receiver = c.emp_email where a.mail_no = #{mailNo}
